rooms.description: Traditional entrance courtyard featuring a water fountain and decorative elements in line with Kerala aesthetics.

Open dining space integrated with the living room. Suitable for joint family meals.
Fully equipped kitchen with modern amenities while maintaining traditional Kerala elements like tiled flooring and ventilation design.
Largest bedroom featuring a private balcony and en-suite bathroom. Designed for optimal Vastu alignment.
Additional bedroom with ample storage and traditional Kerala style decor.
Cozy bedroom designed for extended family members or guests, incorporating natural light and ventilation.
Dedicated space for the domestic help with basic amenities, ensuring privacy and functionality.
